summary: Paul Bunyan is a famous character from American and Canadian folklore. He's a huge lumberjack known for his incredible strength and adventures. Bunyan is often seen with Babe, his giant blue ox. The story started as a popular folk tale among loggers and was later made famous by writer William Laughead. Paul Bunyan has inspired many books, songs, and even big statues across North America.
title: Paul Bunyan
